plot: The young widow of an ice-cream vendor is persuaded by the town mayor to stay in a small 'trullo' instead of leaving town. Though several townsmen show an interest in her, Maddalena remains...
title: La viuda del tonto
plot_es: The young widow of an ice-cream vendor is persuaded by the town mayor to stay in a small 'trullo' instead of leaving town. Though several townsmen show an interest in her, Maddalena remains...
plot_en: The young widow of an ice-cream vendor is persuaded by the town mayor to stay in a small 'trullo' instead of leaving town. Though several townsmen show an interest in her, Maddalena remains...
